Widespread Hokan antelope/bighorn word, Wappo moo'-oo;  see all the way to Seri haamoja; Cocopa mɂu·ł “antelope, probably related to proto-Yuman  *?-mu(w) “bighorn sheep”, perhaps *ahat-m?u·ł  ...??  An old arealism?
